title: Principal Software Engineer - Engg
tagsAndSkills: c#,mvc framework,continuous integration,css,python,software development,web application,relational databases
jobDescription:
Overview

GEP is a diverse, creative team of people passionate about procurement. We invest ourselves entirely in our client’s success, creating strong collaborative relationships that deliver extraordinary value year after year. Our clients include market global leaders with far-flung international operations, Fortune 500 and Global 2000 enterprises, leading government and public institutions. 

 

We deliver practical, effective services and software that enable procurement leaders to maximise their impact on business operations, strategy and financial performance. That’s just some of the things that we do in our quest to build a beautiful company, enjoy the journey and make a difference. GEP is a place where individuality is prized, and talent respected. We’re focused on what is real and effective. GEP is where good ideas and great people are recognized, results matter, and ability and hard work drive achievements. We’re a learning organization, actively looking for people to help shape, grow and continually improve us.

 

Are you one of us?

 

GEP is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, color, national origin, religion, sex, disability status, or any other characteristics protected by law. We are committed to hiring and valuing a global diverse work team.

 

For more information please visit us on GEP.com or check us out on LinkedIn.com.

Responsibilities
  • Responsible for managing timely and quality deliverables through Agile or Iterative development process
  • Responsible for collaborating with the existing technology team to understand and leverage current technology components available under existing products
  • Interaction with individual product teams to understand their requirement and purpose of implementation
  • Conceptualize, Design and Implement modules with individual products
  • Troubleshooting issues across environments
  • Responsible for monitoring, optimizing and performance tuning
  • Come-up with proof of concepts as requested
  • Able to work flexible hours, especially during product launches and post prod launch support when required
Qualifications
  • Candidates should possess 6+ years of experience in software development processes as an end to end developer
  • Experience in technologies - ASP.Net, C#, WCF/Web API, MVC Framework, Java Script, jQuery
  • Working experience on Angular2/4/5/6/7/8
  • Excellent knowledge of Relational Databases and SQL should be able to troubleshoot single handedly
  • Experience of 4+ year in developing web applications using MVC framework
  • Working experience on Azure Cloud based application (preferred)
  • Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
  • Familiarity with continuous integration
  • Document and maintain software functionality
  • Experience working with Multi – threaded applications
  •

title: SAP FICO Consultant
tagsAndSkills: SAP FICO,SAP FICO Implementation,Sap Fico Module,SAP,Consulting,FICO

ambitionBoxData.Title: K Raheja Corp Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
K Raheja Corp is hiring SAP FICO Consultants.


QUALIFICATION:

BE/ B. Tech , B.Com and CA preferred


EXPERIENCE:

7 to 12 Years


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:


  • Facilitate the implementation and support of SAP Financials (focus on FICO Controlling Cost Center Accounting, Profit Center Accounting, Project System, Results Analysis, Unsettled Costs, Month End Close, Overhead assessment and settlement.)
  • Perform detailed analysis of complex business process requirements and provide appropriate system solutions; identify, interpret, validate and document customer requirements
  • Facilitate workshops to collect business requirements
  • Map client business requirements, processes and objectives; develops necessary product modifications to satisfy clients' needs.
  • Design, customize, configure and testing of FI/CO modules.
  • Identify gaps, issues and work around solutions.
  • Document functional designs, test cases and results.
  • Proactively identify and propose business process and/or system enhancements
  • Provide consulting services on both new implementations and existing support projects
  • Coordinate between the business functions and the technical team.
  • Provide ad-hoc training and user support as required
  • Work self-directed and independently; may act as subject matter mentor to junior members
  • Coordination with consultants from other modules such as MM, REFX,SD and PS
  • Knowledge of associated modules to FI/CO i.e.BPC / BO / REFX / ISU-Power
  • Customer facing experience.
  • Good Communication skills.

DESIRED PROFILES:

  • Minimum experience of 8 to 13years required
  • Should have worked on at least 1 implementation and 2 support project
  • Exposure of working in a end user organization is must
  • Exposure to Real Estate Industry will be preferred.

OFFICE LOCATION:

Navi Mumbai - Gigaplex

title: Manager HRBP and HR Compliance
tagsAndSkills: HR Compliance,HRBP,Hrsd,Compliance,Management,Human resource management
jobDescription:
Position - Manager HRBP and HR Compliance


Location - Navi Mumbai


Key Responsibilities :


  • Strategic HR

1. Collaborate with senior stakeholders to align HR strategy with business goals.

2. Develop and implement HR initiatives to support growth ambition.

  • HR Compliance and Policies:

1. Ensure compliance with labor laws and company policies

2. Advise management on HR-related legal and regulatory matters

3. Design, maintain & enhance HR policies to support the shared services

  • Employee Relations:

1. Act as a point of contact for employee concerns, grievances & related consequence management

2. Mediate conflicts and facilitate resolutions between employees and management

3. Define proactive approach to understand risks & mitigate Attrition

  • Talent & Performance management

1. Define & implement Talent framework to develop identified talent

2. Lead the Annual Compensation Review & Bonus payout

3. Enable effective performance appraisal process & enforce organization guidelines through discussions with people managers

  • Employee Engagement:

1. Drive initiatives to enhance employee engagement and satisfaction.

2. Develop strategies for fostering a positive work culture

  • Training and Development:

1. Define effective learning & development plans

2. Identify training needs and enable development plans for employees

3. Coordinate training programs to enhance skills and competencies

  • Development of an Organizational culture that emphasizes customer centricity, collaboration and positive work relationships.
